channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Oil Edges Higher Ahead of U.S. Election
item.description: Oil prices edged higher with all eyes now on the outcome of the U.S. election, the Federal Reserve’s next policy move and China’s National People’s Co...

item.title: ‘If I can’t afford a first-class ticket, I don’t fly’: Stop blaming airline passengers for behaving badly. Flying is a horrible experience. Am I wrong?
item.description: “The airlines have crammed every last bit of humanity onto planes. They offer horrible service.”

item.title: Futures Tick Higher as Election Day Kicks Off
item.description: Stock futures rose modestly and investors focus on election results.

item.title: Schroders shares tumble after fund manager reports outflows
item.description: Shares of U.K. fund manager Schroders fell on Tuesday after it reported outflows in the third quarter and said more money would leave the firm in the ...

item.title: Stock Futures Rise as U.S. Election Day Starts
item.description: Stock futures crept higher as U.S. voters headed to the polls to elect their next president.

item.title: Euro Faces Hit From Tariffs if Trump Wins Election
item.description: The euro was stronger, but could drop to $1.02 over the next 12 months if Trump secures a second presidential term, with a significant hit from second...

item.title: Uber's Real Threat Isn't From Robots
item.description: The ride-hailing pioneer is contending with slowing bookings growth, rising insurance costs and an alliance between DoorDash and Lyft.

item.title: I’m divorced, 69, and my Social Security is $690 a month. I have $10,000 in legal bills. Should I borrow from my IRA?
item.description: “I do not have the funds for professional advice.”

item.title: Fast food restaurants are charging 77% more for this breakfast item than they did 5 years ago. Here’s why.
item.description: Prices for morning menu items have far outpaced the rate of inflation, according to a new study.

item.title: Archer Daniels’ stock slides 6% on profit warning as company says it will restate past financials
item.description: Archer Daniels Midland Co.’s stock tumbled 6% early Tuesday, after the food-processing and ethanol giant published guidance for the third quarter that...
